text: The following is a list of notable Iranian scientists. ==A== * Haleh Afshar \- member of Britain's parliament's House of Lords; she became an academician of the Academy of Social Sciences (in Britain) ==M== * Maryam Mirzakhani - first woman to receive the Fields Medal; she died in 2017 ==O== * Pierre Omidyar - Founder of eBay ==Z== * Lotfi A. Zadeh - Founder of fuzzy logic and fuzzy set; d. in 2017 ==References== * Iranian Iranian
title: List of Iranian scientists
